nodes.text: Stobar was a dark and shadowy planet in the Boeus sector of the Expansion Region, and was known for being a very violent planet, for its many criminals.

In 20 BBY, Savage Opress was seen choking a waitress at Plop Dribble's, a spaceport restaurant, while searching for his brother, Darth Maul. The authorities were alerted, but he escaped onboard a ship and ordered the pilot to Lotho Minor.
